IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: TO PROVIDE COMPREHENSIVE, BEHAVIORAL HEALTHCARE SERVICES THAT ARE CULTURALLY COMPETENT AND EVIDENCE-BASED, AND THAT PROMOTE RECOVERY, DIGNITY, AND WELL BEING FOR CLIENTS, THEIR FAMILIES, AND THE COMMUNITY
IRS990.MissionDescription: TO PROVIDE COMPREHENSIVE, BEHAVIORAL HEALTHCARE SERVICES THAT ARE CULTURALLY COMPETENT AND EVIDENCE-BASED, AND THAT PROMOTE RECOVERY, DIGNITY, AND WELL BEING FOR CLIENTS, THEIR FAMILIES, AND THE COMMUNITY WHICH IS SERVED.
IRS990.Description: EMERGENCY SUPPORT SERVICES - SERVICES TO THE PATIENTS AND COMMUNITY WHICH INCLUDE CRISIS INTERVENTION, SUICIDE/CRISIS HOTLINE AND INPATIENT CRISIS STABILIZATION SERVICES. THE NORD CENTER DURING THIS YEAR HAS ASSESSED 4,239 ADULTS AND 653 KIDS IN CRISIS. THE HOTLINE HAS TAKEN OVER 20,000 CALLS AND HAS ADMITTED 639 CLIENTS DURING THE SAME TIME.

Activity2.Description: COMMUNITY SUPPORT SERVICES - SERVICES TO PATIENTS WITH SEVERE AND PERSISTENT MENTAL ILLNESS THAT INCLUDES HELP WITH ACCESS TO SOCIAL SERVICES, MEDICATION, TREATMENT AND OTHER BASIC HUMAN NEEDS. THE NORD CENTER HAS DELIVERED OVER 44,000 HOURS OF SERVICE TO OVER 1,600 UNIQUE INDIVIDUALS.

Activity3.Description: RESIDENTIAL SERVICES - A SUPPORTIVE HOUSING ENVIRONMENT THAT INCORPORATES A RANGE OF SETTINGS AND LEVELS OF CARE RANGING FROM INDEPENDENT LIVING WITH THE PRESENCE OF A SUPPORTIVE APARTMENT MANAGER TO 24 HOUR STAFFED LICENSED PROVIDER HOMES AND GROUP HOMES. THE NORD CENTER PROVIDED OVER 22,000 DAYS OF RESIDENTIAL SERVICES TO OVER 220 UNIQUE INDIVIDUALS.

NameOfContractor.NamePerson: VORYS SATER SEYMOUR AND PEASE LLP

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ACCORDING TO THE BYLAWS OF THE NORD CENTER, THE ORGANIZATION HAS ELECTED TRUSTEES AND ONE APPOINTED MEMBER, NORCARE ENTERPRISES, INC.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ALL TRUSTEES ARE ELECTED BY THE NORD CENTER AND APPROVED BY NORCARE ENTERPRISES, INC., THE SOLE MEMBER.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: DECISIONS OF GOVERNING BODY APPROVED BY MEMBERS
GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: WHEN CALLED UPON, NORCARE ENTERPRISES, INC. CAN STEP IN AND OVERTURN DECISIONS OF THE NORD CENTER.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 8B
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: NO COMMITTEES POSSESS THE AUTHORITY TO ACT ON BEHALF OF THE GOVERNING BODY.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11A
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY THE FULL BOARD PRIOR TO FILING. A FINAL COPY IS GIVEN TO THE BOARD AT A LATER MEETING.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION MONITORS COMPLIANCE WITH THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY ON AN ANNUAL BASIS. HOWEVER, KEY EMPLOYEES ARE REQUIRED TO COME FORWARD WITH CONFLICTS AT ANY TIME DURING THE MONITORING PROCESS.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINES 15A & B
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION'S CEO IS HIRED BY A BOARD, AND COMPENSATION IS DETERMINED BY A SUBCOMMITTEE. THE ORGANIZATION COMPARES SALARIES WITH INDEPENDENT PEER SURVEYS PROVIDED BY THE OHIO COUNCIL OF BEHAVIORAL HEALTH.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: ALL REQUESTS ARE REVIEWED FOR NECESSITY PRIOR TO SUBMITTING APPLICABLE ORGANIZING DOCUMENTS, POLICIES AND FINANCIAL INFORMATION.
